1814.author: lauritz
1814.message: top-most entry of the tag list is "all" now.

1818.author: lauritz
1818.message: tries to get user directly from localStorage now. if there's no user set, then we don't call CGI - logging into trac should not be necessary for developing parts.

1822.author: lauritz
1822.message: workaround for issue #161 - target morph list is scrollable

1824.author: lauritz

1826.author: lauritz
1826.message: fixed a defect (weeeeeird property caused an error on deserialization of copies)

1830.author: lauritz
1830.message: added a border to notifications, centered notification text

1832.author: lauritz
1832.message: removed a missed debugger statement. corrected setting of target.

1840.author: lauritz
1840.message: Locked down submorphs of the editor pane. Grabbing and dragging disabled.

1842.author: lauritz
1842.message: Adapted the update behavior on ticks. Reduces the impact of HTML's autoscroll to selected list items.

1844.author: lauritz
1844.message: added confirmation before removal of scripts or connections.

1846.author: lauritz
